text: Donald "Don" King (born August 20, 1931) is an American boxing promoter. He has promoted many famous boxers including Mike Tyson, George Foreman, Muhammad Ali, and Evander Holyfield. King was born on August 20, 1931 in Cleveland, Ohio.Don King - A Prison Education He dropped out from Kent State University. King was married to Henrietta King from 1959 until her death in 2010. They had three children. ==References== ==Other websites== * Don King Promotions * Category:1931 births Category:Living people Category:Businesspeople from Cleveland
title: Don King
